Start: ^I am pulled out of head by the sound of empty tins falling over behind me.
^I look over, and see, Eduardo, looking worse for wear.
^In fact, it looks like he's been crying recently.
^"Sorry. I've never been one to hide how I feel."
^] "I'm actually surprised how much Timothy's panic attack is affecting you?"
^[Eduardo] "Yeah, sure. That's it. Cuz I'm just <flow>sooo</flow> empathetic."
^He laughes some more, but even I can tell its fake.
^, you shouldn't have to deal with two people's broken minds in one day."
^"Beside, I, uh, came in here, becuase I thought it was empty. I just want to be left alone right now."
^"So, uh, see ya at dinner, or whatever."
^I almost feel a bit better knowing I'm not the only one having a bad day becuase of this. @Commiseration relieved a small amount of depression.
